error400: The requested information could not be processed
error401: You don't have the necessary authorization to access this section
error403: You don't have the necessary permissions to access this content
error404: The requested content Couldn't be find
error500: There is an internal error in the service, please try again
deleted: The information has been successfully deleted.
deleteProductColors: The colors of this product have not been deleted.
deleteProductFeatures: The features of this product have not been deleted.
deleteProductImages: The images of this product have not been deleted.
deleteProductSizes: The sizes of this product have not been deleted.
deleteProductTags: The tags on this product have not been deleted.
deleteProductWishes: Failed to delete this product from user wish lists.
deleteUserWishes: The user's wish list has not been removed
hasRelatedProps: This registry has related feature properties

noStored: The information couldn't be stored, please try again
noUpdated: The information couldn't be updated, please try again
orderInformation: Thank you for shopping at our store, we are happy that you can enjoy our products. We tell you below about the information of your purchase:
passwordIncorrect: Your actual password is not correct
registered: The information has been registered correctly.
restorePassword: You have received this e-mail because you requested the recovery of your password. If you don't request it, please delete this email
restoreToken: You have received this e-mail because you requested the recovery of your password. Please use this code to restore your password.
updated: The information has been updated correctly
updateProductOrders: The orders associated with this product could not be modified
updateUserOrders: The orders associated with this user could not be modified
userRegistered: You are logged in our store, you can't register again.
welcome: We welcome you to our virtual store, we also thank you for registering and being interested in buying in the store. Here you can find many products of your taste.
